/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a sweeping view of the street below. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene atmosphere over the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky.
